ygData.subject: Re: Darkness Strikes
ygData.msgSnippet: Forget it alright. Winged Warrior told me you re in charge of the Infecticon base in the Atlantic Ocean. Mustex, Rhesus, Gorzo, and Thunderstorm are there now.

Forget it alright. Winged Warrior told me you're in charge of the 
Infecticon base in the Atlantic Ocean. Mustex, Rhesus, Gorzo, and 
Thunderstorm are there now. Mustex sent our a message. Either respond 
or Mustex'll tell Thunderstorm to open fire (since the others are 
hardly in a position to do such). And getting power from the pit has 
nothing to do with it.  In fact he's looking for bots to SELL there 
sparks and what good would that be if they were already with the pit?

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Legendarynemasis@a... wrote:
> because it wasnt directed towards him, and pin pointing every evil 
robot on 
> the planet is useless. As Evil is all in the eye of the beholder. 
Meaning the 
> Infectcions are really good guys, as are the decepts and everyone he 
cant 
> just pick one evil bot out of an entire planet of them. Also he 
wouldnt to it 
> anyway since the infecticons dont draw energy from the pit. They get 
it 
> somewhere else. In other words, SS cant find the mysterious bot.
